backend/main.mo: Defines the main actor, domain types, authorization mixin, Stripe integration, persistent maps, and helpers for subscriptions, referrals, predictions, and user profiles.
backend/migration.mo: Provides a migration function that upgrades old user profiles by adding a new referral field and returns updated actor state.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence records linking referral-code features to frontend files, components, and requirement IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of all major frontend components and pages, including routing, UI elements, and feature integrations.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and theme variables for light and dark modes, establishing global styling tokens.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point that loads the React application via main.tsx into the root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, wraps the app in ThemeProvider, and defines all primary page routes including support and terms.
frontend/src/components/AccountProfileEd: UI card allowing users to edit and submit profile name and email with validation and update hooks.
frontend/src/components/AdminGate.tsx: Component that checks admin status and conditionally renders children or an access-denied screen.
frontend/src/components/AppFooter.tsx: Footer component with branding, navigation links, social icons, and dynamic year plus Caffeine attribution.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Header with navigation, authentication-aware links, mobile menu toggle, and branding.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Layout wrapper including header, footer, and conditional profile setup modal for new authenticated users.
frontend/src/components/DabbleFormatCard: Formats a prediction into Dabble-friendly text and provides copy-to-clipboard functionality.
frontend/src/components/HeroBranding.tsx: Hero section displaying large branding visuals and tagline for the app.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Button handling login/logout via Internet Identity with status feedback.
frontend/src/components/PredictionsFilte: UI controls for selecting sport filters and sort order for predictions.
frontend/src/components/PremiumGate.tsx: Gates premium content based on user authentication and subscription status with optional preview.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting new users to enter name and email to create their profile.
frontend/src/components/RedeemReferralCo: Card allowing users to enter and redeem referral codes with validation and feedback.
frontend/src/components/ReferralCodesAdm: Admin UI to create, list, copy, and revoke referral codes with duration-based validity.
frontend/src/components/ResponsibleGambl: Displays a disclaimer about prediction accuracy and responsible gambling warnings.
frontend/src/components/StripePaymentSet: Form for configuring Stripe secret keys and allowed countries, saving settings via API.
frontend/src/components/SubscribeCta.tsx: Promotional CTA component encouraging users to view pricing and subscribe to premium predictions.
frontend/src/components/TermsAcceptanceG: Gate component that requires users to accept Terms of Service before accessing protected content.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmin.ts: React Query hooks for admin operations including permissions check and setting various data fields.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, login flow, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks to fetch predictions, including all predictions, predictions by sport, and a single prediction.
frontend/src/hooks/useReferralCodes.ts: Implements admin and user hooks for listing, creating, revoking, and redeeming referral codes with React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useStripeCheckout.ts: Handles Stripe checkout session creation, Stripe configuration checks, and updating Stripe settings.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubscription.ts: Fetches subscription and referral status and computes whether the user has active access.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Provides hooks to fetch and update the current user's profile via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables, dark mode values, and utility classes for custom colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AccountPage.tsx: Renders the authenticated user's account page showing profile info, subscription status, and referral access.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Provides admin UI for Stripe setup, referral codes, and updating depth charts, injuries, coaching styles, news, and predictions.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Displays the marketing landing page with feature highlights and pricing sections.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Displays a payment failure message with options to retry subscribing or return home.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Shows a payment success confirmation, triggers a toast, and provides navigation to predictions or account.
Loads and displays detailed information about a specific prediction with metadata, risk tier, and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/PredictionsPage.tsx: Lists all predictions with filtering, sorting, and gating, handling loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/PricingPage.tsx: Presents monthly and yearly subscription plans and handles Stripe checkout creation after terms acceptance.
frontend/src/pages/SendSupportPage.tsx: Provides Cash App support info with copy-to-clipboard and external link options.
frontend/src/pages/TermsPage.tsx: Displays Terms of Service content and allows users to accept and store acceptance status.
frontend/src/utils/riskTier.ts: Maps a prediction's winning probability to a tiered risk level with labels, descriptions, and Tailwind color classes.
frontend/src/utils/termsAcceptance.ts: Handles reading, writing, and clearing a user's terms-acceptance flag in localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and manage hash-based query values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, themes, typography, container settings, and animation keyframes.
project_state.json: Defines the projectâ€™s state, goals, architecture notes, and existing feature list for the cash-themed predictions app.
